item.title: [DERBY-4864] Master issue to track tasks needed to produce 10.7.1 release
item.summary: Master issue to track tasks needed to produce 10.7.1 release

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Changed JIRA release id from 10.7.0.0 to 10.7.1.0 in order to test-driver the new soap-based generator for release notes.

Created filter for fixed 10.7.1 issues: 12314683: https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/IssueNavigator.jspa?mode=hide&requestId=12314683
Attaching derby-4864-01-aa-releaseSummary.diff, the first cut of a release summary for 10.7.1. Committed at subversion revision 1026398.

Attaching derby-4864-02-aa-pointToApacheSite.diff. This patch adds a pointer to the Apache web site to the release notes. Committed at subversion revision 1031558.

Touches the following files:

M releaseSummary.xml
M RELEASE-NOTES.html

Attaching derby-4864-03-aa-releaseNotesDraft1.diff. This is the first draft of release notes for 10.7.1.

I also changed the way that the ReleaseNotesGenerator picks up the release id. Previously, the ReleaseNotesGenerator looked in release.properties for this information. That's reasonable and works for already-created branches. However, it picks up an alpha release number if you are generating the release notes before you have cut the branch for a feature release. I made the release id a paramater to the ant task and made the ant target use the same value for this parameter that is used for the call to the SOAP machinery.

Touches the following files:

-------------

M java/build/org/apache/derbyBuild/GeneratorBase.java
M tools/release/build.xml

Changes to how we figure out the release id.

-------------

M RELEASE-NOTES.html

First draft of the 10.7.1 release notes.

Attaching derby-4864-04-aa-releaseVerification.diff. This patch adds to the release notes a section on how to verify the release distributions. Committed at subversion revision 1033590.

This section appears on the download page for all Derby releases. In the past, the release manager had to remember to add this section to the copy of the release notes which went on the web site. I have added the section to the copy of the release notes which is bundled with the release. I did this because:

1) The instructions are sensible advice in the bundled version as well as in the web site version.

2) This eliminates another step which the release manager has to remember to perform after the vote finishes.

Touches the following files:

--------------

M releaseSummary.xml

Adds the section to the input material for the release notes.

--------------

M java/build/org/apache/derbyBuild/ReleaseNotesGenerator.java

Picks up the new section from the release summary and appends it to the release notes.

--------------

M RELEASE-NOTES.html

Corresponding new version of the release notes for 10.7.1.0.

Attaching derby-4864-05-aa-backpointer.diff. This patch makes the release notes point at the Derby download page so that readers can navigate quickly to the most up to date information about the release. Committed at subversion revision 1033971.

Touches the following files:

M releaseSummary.xml
M RELEASE-NOTES.html

Attaching derby-4864-06-aa-releaseNotesDraft2.diff, the second draft of the release notes. This draft incorporates Dag's comments. Committed at subversion revision 1034547. Touches the following files:

M java/build/org/apache/derbyBuild/ReleaseNotesGenerator.java
M java/build/org/apache/derbyBuild/GeneratorBase.java
M releaseSummary.xml
M RELEASE-NOTES.html

Attaching derby-4864-07-aa-newBranchOnSite.diff. This patch adds 10.7 to the list of branches on the Derby web site. Committed at subversion revision 1035271.

Touches the following files:

----------

M src/documentation/content/xdocs/dev/derby_source.xml

Changes to the source for the website.

----------

M build/site/dev/derby_source.html

Generated output.

Attaching derby-4864-08-aa-dataDictionaryVersion.diff. This patch changes the trunk DataDictionary version to be 10.8. I ran the upgrade tests on the 10.3.3.0 -> 10.8.0.0 trajectory. They ran cleanly. Committed at subversion

This patch may cause other problems. The documentation at http://wiki.apache.org/db-derby/CreatingDerbyBranch didn't mention that you need to edit DD_Version.majorToString() to add a case for the new release id. As we sweep up the other omissions, let's document them on the wiki page.

Touches the following files:

------------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/iapi/sql/dictionary/DataDictionary.java

Added new major version, 10.8.

------------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/impl/sql/catalog/DataDictionaryImpl.java

Made 10.8 the version stamped in the data dictionary when you create a new database.

------------

M java/engine/org/apache/derby/impl/sql/catalog/DD_Version.java

Added the new version to the pretty-print logic.
Attaching derby-4864-09-aa-relnotesForRC1.diff, the release notes for the first release candidate. Committed at subversion revision 1035298.
Attaching derby-4864-10-aa-relnotesForRC2.diff, the release notes for release candidate 2. Committed at subversion revision 1040131.
Committed changes to DOAP descriptor (derby-4864-11-aa-doap.diff) at subversion revision 1049163.
Attaching derby-4864-12-aa-addToUpgradeTests.diff, which adds 10.7.1.1 to the list of legal starting points for the upgrade tests. Committed at subversion revision 1049190.
Attaching the changes to the STATUS file which reflect the release of 10.7.1.1: derby-4864-13-aa-status.diff. Committed at subversion revision 1049209.

Attaching derby-4864-14-aa-frontPage.diff. This patch updates the front page to note the publication of 10.7.1.1. While I was in there, I changed Derby's copyright claim in src/documentation/skinconf.xml. This updates a lot of pages with a footer now claiming copyright up through 2010 rather than 2007. I will open another JIRA to note that we have an annual task to update this claim.

I left the reference to ApacheCon 2010 on the front page. We will want to update that in a while too, I think.

Committed at subversion revision 1049694.
